item.title: Hello, I'm Abdul Kalam
item.description:
Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I’m Abdul Kalam, a computer science student at FAST University.

I enjoy exploring software development, cloud computing, and data engineering.
I like working on projects that combine practical applications with learning new technologies.

On this blog, I’ll share my projects, experiments, and thoughts about programming, technology, and problem-solving.

Feel free to explore my posts and connect with me if you find something interesting!
